text: Tring was a hundred occupying an area now compromised by Dacorum, Hertfordshire. Tring hundred was absorbed by Dacorum in the 16th century. Tring contained the following settlements prior to being unified with Dacorum: * Aldbury * Great Berkhampsted * Little Gaddesden * Hemel Hempstead * King's Langley * Puttenham * Redbourn (partial) * Shenley * Wigginton * Great Gaddesden (partial) == See also == * List of hundreds of England and Wales § Hertfordshire * List of lost settlements in Hertfordshire == References == Category:History of Hertfordshire Category:Hundreds of Hertfordshire
title: Tring (hundred)
